016
017package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.yaml;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.Configuration;
020import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.MappedConfiguration;
021import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.file.AbstractFileConfiguration;
022import org.jetbrains.annotations.Contract;
023import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
024import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.Unmodifiable;
026import org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions;
027import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
028import org.yaml.snakeyaml.representer.Representer;
029
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
032import java.nio.file.Files;
033import java.nio.file.Path;
034import java.util.Collections;
035import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.Objects;
039import java.util.Set;
040import java.util.function.Supplier;
041
042/**
043 * A class that implements {@link Configuration} for Yaml file.
044 * <p>
045 * This class can load from or save to Yaml file.
046 * <p>
047 * In the internal, this manages keys and values in {@link MappedConfiguration}.
048 */
049public class YamlConfiguration extends AbstractFileConfiguration {
050
051    private static final Supplier<Yaml> DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER;
052
053    static {
054        var options = new DumperOptions();
055        options.setDefaultFlowStyle(DumperOptions.FlowStyle.BLOCK);
056
057        var representer = new Representer();
058        representer.setDefaultFlowStyle(DumperOptions.FlowStyle.BLOCK);
059
060        DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER = () -> new Yaml(representer, options);
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path}.
065     *
066     * @param path the path to load or save
067     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
068     */
069    @Contract("_ -> new")
070    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path) {
071        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER));
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path} and other {@link Configuration}.
076     *
077     * @param path  the path to load or save
078     * @param other the other {@link Configuration}
079     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
080     */
081    @Contract("_, _ -> new")
082    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Configuration other) {
083        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER), other);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path}
088     * and specified supplier of {@link Yaml}.
089     *
090     * @param path         the path to load or save
091     * @param yamlSupplier the supplier of {@link Yaml}
092     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
093     */
094    @Contract("_, _ -> new")
095    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Supplier<Yaml> yamlSupplier) {
096        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(yamlSupplier));
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path},
101     * other {@link Configuration}, and specified supplier of {@link Yaml}.
102     *
103     * @param path         the path to load or save
104     * @param yamlSupplier the supplier of {@link Yaml}
105     * @param other        the other {@link Configuration}
106     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
107     */
108    @Contract("_, _, _ -> new")
109    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Supplier<Yaml> yamlSupplier, @NotNull Configuration other) {
110        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(yamlSupplier), other);
111    }
112
113    private final ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal;
114    private Configuration config;
115
116    private YamlConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal) {
117        super(path);
118        this.yamlThreadLocal = yamlThreadLocal;
119    }
120
121    private YamlConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal, @NotNull Configuration other) {
122        super(path);
123        this.yamlThreadLocal = yamlThreadLocal;
124        this.config = MappedConfiguration.create(other);
125    }
126
127    @Override
128    public @Nullable Object get(@NotNull String path) {
129        return config != null ? config.get(path) : null;
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
134        if (config == null) {
135            config = MappedConfiguration.create();
136        }
137
138        config.set(path, value);
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<String> getKeyList() {
143        return config != null ? config.getKeyList() : Collections.emptyList();
144    }
145
146    @Override
147    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable Set<Object> getValues() {
148        return config != null ? config.getValues() : Collections.emptySet();
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    public @Nullable Configuration getSection(@NotNull String path) {
153        return config != null ? config.getSection(path) : null;
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public @NotNull Configuration getOrCreateSection(@NotNull String path) {
158        if (config == null) {
159            config = MappedConfiguration.create();
160        }
161
162        return config.getOrCreateSection(path);
163    }
164
165    @Override
166    public void clear() {
167        if (config != null) {
168            config.clear();
169            config = null;
170        }
171
172        setLoaded(false);
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public @NotNull YamlConfiguration copy() {
177        var copied =
178                config != null ?
179                        new YamlConfiguration(getPath(), yamlThreadLocal, config) :
180                        new YamlConfiguration(getPath(), yamlThreadLocal);
181
182        copied.setLoaded(isLoaded());
183
184        return copied;
185    }
186
187    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
188    @Override
189    public void load() throws IOException {
190        clear();
191
192        if (!Files.isRegularFile(getPath())) {
193            return;
194        }
195
196        Yaml yaml = yamlThreadLocal.get();
197        Map<Object, Object> map;
198
199        var contents = Files.readString(getPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
200        map = yaml.loadAs(contents, LinkedHashMap.class);
201
202        config = MappedConfiguration.create(map);
203
204        setLoaded(true);
205    }
206
207    @Override
208    public void save() throws IOException {
209        Yaml yaml = yamlThreadLocal.get();
210
211        var map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
212
213        if (config != null) {
214            for (var key : config.getKeyList()) {
215                map.put(key, config.get(key));
216            }
217        }
218
219        var parent = getPath().getParent();
220
221        if (parent != null) {
222            Files.createDirectories(parent);
223        }
224
225        var dump = yaml.dump(map);
226        Files.writeString(getPath(), dump, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
227    }
228
229    @Override
230    public boolean equals(Object o) {
231        if (this == o) return true;
232        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
233        YamlConfiguration that = (YamlConfiguration) o;
234        return yamlThreadLocal.equals(that.yamlThreadLocal) && Objects.equals(config, that.config);
235    }
236
237    @Override
238    public int hashCode() {
239        return Objects.hash(yamlThreadLocal, config);
240    }
241
242    @Override
243    public String toString() {
244        return "YamlConfiguration{" +
245                "yamlThreadLocal=" + yamlThreadLocal +
246                ", config=" + config +
247                '}';
248    }
249}
